title: U.S. online shopping frequency 2014 to 2017
summary: More than 32 % of Mexican internet users surveyed in 2014 claimed they used At_least_once_a_week for finding dates .
Meanwhile , one out of four respondents cited Once_or_more_per_month and 13 % of people surveyed mentioned 7-12_times_per_year .
Sex and solitude Approximately 42.7 % of Mexicans who used 2014 2017 stated in 2017 that they did so in order to find friends .
gold: This statistic presents the online shopping frequency of internet users in the United States as of March 2017 . During the most recent survey period , 29 percent of respondents stated they purchased goods online at least once a week .
